2081.subject: BUS
2081.course_title_long: Survey of Org Info Tech Sys
2081.descrlong: Explores important issues shaping the IT systems that characterize contemporary organizations in the digital world.  Introduces the basic system components found in most IT environments, predominant issues and factors pertaining to technology adoption and use at the enterprise level, and trends in emerging information technologies and their impact on organizations. (Offered Fall semester.)
